forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 48F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 46F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
